text: Helena Stone is an American technology blogger, reviewer and columnist, and the editor-in-chief of Geekspin, a technology blog. == Career == In 2004, Helena co-founded Chip Chick, a women's technology blog while she was still studying. Later, she worked as a social content manager at BrickHouse Security. Stone held the position of editor-in-chief at Chip Chick until 2017 when she transitioned to the role of editor-in-chief at Geekspin. During this time she also worked with Intel, Virgin Mobile and Woman's Day Magazine. Stone is a frequent blogger and tech reviewer, and her reviews are often cited by sites including Huffington post. Stone was one of the judges of Gadgety Awards for best consumer electronics at IFA 2023. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bloggers
title: Helena Stone
